name: moorland puff stitch hat
sizes_available: preemie, newborn, 0-3 months, 3-6 months, 6-12 months, 12-24 months, small child (3-5 years), child (6-10 years), teen (adult small), adult medium, adult large
notes:
✨ new pattern alert! ✨ check out my moorland puff stitch hat, a beautiful beanie made with dk weight yarn and a 4.5mm hook. perfect for cozy days, this hat is worked from the top down in one piece. pair it with the matching scarf for a lovely gift set!  free patterns on my website, or get ad-free pdfs in my shop. 

**grab your free hat pattern from my website or purchase the ad-free pdf right here on ravelry.**

a photo tutorial for the puff stitch is included in the post and in the pdf version.

this is just one of the patterns included in our may hat of the month club collection.

join the club newsletter here: https://oombawkadesigncrochet.ck.page/0fde95d68d
